task.title: Adding the Apache Tomcat runtimes
task.shortdesc: Using the Preferences page, you can define the installed server runtime definitions for the Apache Tomcat server. To define these definitions, complete the following:

keywords.indexterm: workbenchdefining server runtime environment Apache Tomcat

step.cmd: From the Window menu, select Preferences.
In the Preferences window, expand Server and then select Installed Runtimes.
On the Installed Server Runtime Environments page, click Add.
On the New Server Runtime page, expand Apache.
Select one of the following supported Apache Tomcat servers:
The Tomcat Server page opens when you click Next.
In the Tomcat installation directory field, type or browse to the directory where you extracted the installation files of Apache Tomcat.
